Detailed Description

Function for communication with the pob-proto board.


The pob-proto board has PORTA, PORTC and PORTD.

  1. PORTA can be set as input/ouput or as analogic port.
  2. PORTC can be drive servomotor.



Before use function of this file you must init the pob-proto port with this function :

  1. SetPobProto() if you use the POB-PROTO.
  2. SetTinyPobProto() if you have the tiny POB-PROTO.

Author:
Pierre SEGUIN & Baptiste BURLES. POB-Technology

Define Documentation

#define ALL_PORTA_AS_ANA   0x0100

set PORTA as analogic

#define RA0_AS_DI   0x01

set pin 0 PORTA as digital input

#define RA0_AS_DO   0

set pin 0 PORTA as digital output

#define RA1_AS_DI   0x02

set pin 1 PORTA as digital input

#define RA1_AS_DO   0

set pin 1 PORTA as digital output

#define RA2_AS_DI   0x04

set pin 2 PORTA as digital input

#define RA2_AS_DO   0

set pin 2 PORTA as digital output

#define RA3_AS_DI   0x08

set pin 3 PORTA as digital input

#define RA3_AS_DO   0

set pin 3 PORTA as digital output

#define RA4_AS_DI   0x10

set pin 4 PORTA as digital input

#define RA4_AS_DO   0

set pin 4 PORTA as digital output

#define RA5_AS_DI   0x20

set pin 5 PORTA as digital input

#define RA5_AS_DO   0

set pin 5 PORTA as digital output

#define RC0_AS_DI   0x01

set pin 0 PORTC as digital input

#define RC0_AS_DO   0x00

set pin 0 PORTC as digital output

#define RC0_AS_SERVO   0x0100

set pin 0 PORTC as a servomotor

#define RC1_AS_DI   0x02

set pin 1 PORTC as digital input

#define RC1_AS_DO   0x00

set pin 1 PORTC as digital output

#define RC1_AS_SERVO   0x0200

set pin 1 PORTC as a servomotor

#define RC2_AS_DI   0x04

set pin 2 PORTC as digital input

#define RC2_AS_DO   0x00

set pin 2 PORTC as digital output

#define RC2_AS_SERVO   0x0400

set pin 2 PORTC as a servomotor

#define RC3_AS_DI   0x08

set pin 3 PORTC as digital input

#define RC3_AS_DO   0x00

set pin 3 PORTC as digital output

#define RC3_AS_SERVO   0x0800

set pin 3 PORTC as a servomotor

#define RC6_AS_DI   0x40

set pin 6 PORTC as digital input

#define RC6_AS_DO   0x00

set pin 6 PORTC as digital output

#define RC6_AS_SERVO   0x1000

set pin 6 PORTC as a servomotor

#define RC7_AS_DI   0x80

set pin 7 PORTC as digital input

#define RC7_AS_DO   0x00

set pin 7 PORTC as digital output

#define RC7_AS_SERVO   0x2000

set pin 7 PORTC as a servomotor

#define RD0_AS_DI   0x01

set pin 0 PORTD as digital input

#define RD0_AS_DO   0

set pin 0 PORTD as digital output

#define RD1_AS_DI   0x02

set pin 1 PORTD as digital input

#define RD1_AS_DO   0

set pin 1 PORTD as digital output

#define RD2_AS_DI   0x04

set pin 2 PORTD as digital input

#define RD2_AS_DO   0

set pin 2 PORTD as digital output

#define RD3_AS_DI   0x08

set pin 3 PORTD as digital input

#define RD3_AS_DO   0

set pin 3 PORTD as digital output

#define RD4_AS_DI   0x10

set pin 4 PORTD as digital input

#define RD4_AS_DO   0

set pin 4 PORTD as digital output

#define RD5_AS_DI   0x20

set pin 5 PORTD as digital input

#define RD5_AS_DO   0

set pin 5 PORTD as digital output

#define RD6_AS_DI   0x40

set pin 6 PORTD as digital input

#define RD6_AS_DO   0

set pin 6 PORTD as digital output

void SetPobProto ( PobProto *  Proto  ) 

Write the current configuration of the port on the pob-proto board.

PORTA pin 0 to 5. PORTC pin 0 to 3 and 6 to 7 and PORTD pin 0 to 7.

Warning:
PORTA can be set as input/output or as analogic but not as analogic/input/ouput. pin 4 and 5 of PORTC are reserved.

if you set PORTA as analogic, pin 4 can't be used as analogic ! On the POB-PROTO board, you have only pin 0,1,2,3,5 as analogic.

Parameters:
Proto : Configuration port.

void SetPortA ( UInt8  data  ) 

Set value of PORTA.

Parameters:
data : the data to set

Parameters:
data : the data to set

void SetServoMotor ( UInt8  RCx,
UInt8  Pos 
)

Set the position of the servomotor.

Warning, you can't use the servomotor pin 4 and 5 on the PORTC.

Parameters:
RCx : on what pin the servomotor is connected
Pos : the new position of the servomotor.
